sentence.Network_en: He could procure the co - operation of any number of gentlemanlike curates.
sentence.Network_cn: 他可以找到许多举止高雅的副牧师来和他合作.

sentence.Network_en: Mr Bingley was good - looking and gentlemanlike, he had a pleasant countenance , and easy, unaffected manners.
sentence.Network_cn: 宾利先生仪表堂堂, 大有绅士风度,而且和颜悦色, 没有拘泥做作的气派.

sentence.Network_en: Mr Bingley was good - looking and gentlemanlike ; he had a pleasant countenance , and easy , unaffected manner.
sentence.Network_cn: 彬格莱先生仪表堂堂,大有绅士风度, 而且和颜悦色, 没有拘泥做作的习气.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语新词汇与常用词汇的翻译... ... gentleman-pensioner 四十侍卫之一 gentlemanlike 举止高雅的 gentlemanly 绅士派头的.
每天翻译一页《傲慢与偏见》... ... gentlemanlike ： 绅士风度。 brother-in-law ： 大伯子，小叔子，内兄，内底。姐夫，妹夫。.
”英国人所谓的“绅士派头”（Gentlemanlike），或称“君子风度”，是其特有的民族性，难以描述它是自然还是做作，但只要你踏上英伦…

list.abs: 南山二外塑造“绅士、淑女”型的学生群体形象(gentlemanlike and gentle ladylike),培养合格的学校小公民(school citizen)和社会小公民.
and in such a gentlemanlike way !这种绅士的方式！

the open-minded and shibui civilization of Europe gave him gentlemanlike behavior , and the natural and harmonious culture of Orient gave him supreme wisdom .欧洲文明的开放与典雅培养了他的绅士举止，而自然和谐的东方文化则赋予他最高的智慧。
